website_summaries.verdict: High-cut basketball shoe that's lightweight and has good grip on various surfaces.
pros: Versatile ladies court shoes by Nike
We love the level of shock absorption
Good mix of fabric and synthetic materials
cons: Area around the ankle can be a bit uncomfortable

customer_reviews.title: Good ankle support and forefoot padding.
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is great once you are able to get it on! It is extremely difficult to put it on, even when it is completely unlaced, because the opening doesn't spread much, and you have to negotiate the bend in the shoe between the ankle part and the foot bed. I am 75 years old, and still do rigorous aerobics, need the ankle support, and am willing to put up with the problems of putting this shoe on, because once I have done so, I feel confident that my ankles will not turn and my knees are protected as well.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Steele

customer_reviews.title: These are in womens sizes not mens!!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe!! We ordered the wrong size because we ordered in Men's size but these are womens sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Girlygirlmom

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, but difficult to put on.
customer_reviews.text: I think these shoes are going to be great on the court - lots of ankle support, but not too stiff. My only problem is they are difficult to put on. They are built to hold the top in place for good ankle support, so it's difficult to get my foot in the shoe. Once they are on, they feel awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: Nice find. Neat color choice that's not commonly found in stores.
customer_reviews.author: A. Blair

customer_reviews.title: Excellent womens basketball shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Fit well and are really comfortable. There is one piece of material like a hard thread poking into the top of the feet. Tough to get to and trim.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the way these look, although they are a little uncomfortable around the ankles.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie L. J.

customer_reviews.title: Basketball shoes on point!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were exactly how they were described. It's an excellent basketball shoe with the exact support that my niece needed in terms of the sport itself. I was impressed!
customer_reviews.author: akolisahola

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter for basketball season. She loves them and says they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Bergquist

customer_reviews.title: They feel and fit better than really expensive special orthotic shoes from a Doctor
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are heaven sent,they fit so well I want to sleep in them,shower in them. I don't ever want to take them off. Lol I am a diabetic and shoes really make the difference.They feel and fit better than really expensive special orthotic shoes from a Doctor. I would recommend them to any diabetics,friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Weaver

customer_reviews.title: She does love the
customer_reviews.text: The girl is slam dunking it now,,, haha... She does love the shoes
customer_reviews.author: barredrock

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: There is overlapping fabric near the ankle which is uncomfortable. They feel kind of clunky too. Much prefer my curries and kyries. But for the right price they arent terrible. I use them for outdoor courts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise (since it is her second pair) it is a great basketball shoe
customer_reviews.text: The shoe was what we wanted and what we ordered, but when our grand daughter tried it on we decided we needed a 7.5 for her instead of the 7.o we ordered. Otherwise (since it is her second pair) it is a great basketball shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Although it is a nice looking shoe this is a very small slim fit ...
customer_reviews.text: Although it is a nice looking shoe this is a very small slim fit did not fit my child properly couldn't even get a foot in side of it so smaller fit then it says.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Kilinski

customer_reviews.title: The color and look is amazing but the inside is like a sock and if ...
customer_reviews.text: The color and look is amazing but the inside is like a sock and if you have wide feet then these will be extremely tight for you.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They were beautiful shoes, but ended up being to small. I had to return , with no problems
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: When I received the shoes I was overjoyed!!
customer_reviews.text: The picture of the pants threw me off. When I received the shoes I was overjoyed!!! My daughter plays bob happily now. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and fits right
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter for basketball and she loves them. Comfortable and fits right....not much else to ask for from a shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Wade Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter is completely satisfied with the choice of the shoes we got for her for basketball
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great performance basketball sneaker!
customer_reviews.text: Hyperdunk 2016 is the best year of the hyperdunk so far. Cushion, traction, fit, support and lockdown are all good.
customer_reviews.author: adam royal

customer_reviews.title: Shoe sizes
customer_reviews.text: On the order it say M for size men’s. So I order down for men’s sizes. Turns out that they are in womens sizes and are too small for me
customer_reviews.author: Rachel McNulty

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: Shoes have tongue sewn into base, so impossible to get a small foot into them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Junk! Don't waste your money. See Photos!
customer_reviews.text: All 3 of my Daughter's 2016 Hyperdunks are junk. Orange pair used for 1 month. Black pair used for 2 months. White pair used for 1 season. Nike Corporate would not stand behind their product either. Horrible shoes & service!
customer_reviews.author: J W

customer_reviews.title: Junk! Don't waste your money. See Photos!
customer_reviews.text: All 3 of my Daughter's 2016 Hyperdunks are junk. Orange pair used for 1 month. Black pair used for 2 months. White pair used for 1 season. Nike Corporate would not stand behind their product either. Horrible shoes & service!
customer_reviews.author: J W

customer_reviews.title: ... squealed when they got here she said they fit perfect once she plays in them we will know
customer_reviews.text: she loves them even squealed when they got here she said they fit perfect once she plays in them we will know more
customer_reviews.author: Deanna C.

product_meta.title: Nike Women's Basketball Shoes
product_meta.description: Original and exklusive sport products by Nike
feature_bullets: Mid-top collar designed to offer comfortable support without restricting movement
Zoom air cushioning delivers a lightweight, responsive ride
Mid-top design provides comfortable support around the ankle
Heel and forefoot Zoom Air units deliver low-profile responsiveness, Herringbone pattern offers traction for multi-directional movement
